ModMetaData.name: [1.1] Deep Scanner Patch
ModMetaData.author: Proxyer
ModMetaData.description: Description : Expand the range size of resources that can be scanned by the ground-penetrating scanner. Underground resources will be discovered more extensively. Mod list order : This mod is a patch mod, so always place it at the bottom of the mod list. Existing save data : Since this mod only add patch operations, it can be safely installed in existing save data. You can also safely remove the mod at any time.
